properties.name: Temple of Midgaard
properties.description: A large temple surrounds you, with sculptures of gods adorning the walls.

properties.name: Hassan
properties.long: Hassan stands here, waiting to dispense some justice
properties.description: Standing at over 12 feet tall, with an earth-like consistency, Hassan has an intimidating appearance even for a giant.

properties.name: The temple altar
properties.description: A sacrificial pit sits in the middle of a large altar room, with acolytes of the temple performing ceremonial duties.

properties.name: a sacrificial pit
properties.description: A pit is here, containing treasures donated from other adventurers.

properties.name: an acolyte of the temple
properties.long: an acolyte of the temple stands before you, ready to help you practice

properties.name: Temple Garden
properties.description: A small fountain lies to the side of the cobblestone path, which dissects an impressive garden. The temple of Midgaard is to the north, with the market square to the south.

properties.name: an ornate fountain
properties.description: An ornately carved fountain is the centerpiece to the temple garden.

properties.name: a small plaque
properties.description:
A small brass plaque is here, affixed to the temple wall, it reads:
Welcome to Midgaard.

properties.name: an adept of Mojo
properties.long: an adept of Mojo walks the garden
properties.description: An adept of Mojo is here, wearing a white linen robe and tending to the temple.

properties.name: Entrance to the Cleric's Guild
properties.description: The foyer to the cleric's guild is a large room built out of heavy stone bricks. A bronze plaque hangs on the farthest wall, next to the door leading deeper further into the guild.

properties.name: Midgaard Market Square
properties.description: Cobblestone paths from all directions converge here, with shops lining a massive square.

properties.name: a dust-covered wooden trap door
properties.description: Concealed just underneath a layer of dirt is a mysterious looking trap door.

properties.name: Midgaard city guard
properties.long: a Midgaard city guard is here, patrolling the streets
properties.description: A tall guard stands here, patrolling the streets of Midgaard.

properties.name: Midgaard sewer system
properties.description: Chipped rock walls offer no light or comfort in this barren, dirty tunnel.

properties.name: Midgaard sewers
properties.description: Chipped, concrete walls span into the darkness.
